pwa.offlineDescription: You are currently offline. Some features may be limited.
pwa.onlineDescription: You are back online. All features are available.
pwa.updateDescription: A new version of the application is available. Click to update.
pwa.installPromptDescription: Install UDRG MMS on your device for offline access and enhanced experience.
pwa.installSuccessDescription: The app has been successfully installed. You can now access it from your home screen.
pwa.notSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support Progressive Web Apps. Some features may not be available.
